column9: My pain management M.D. tried this for breakthrough pain.Because the delivery of the drug is dependant on how you turn it in your mouth etc, I began to need more and more of this drug to cover breakthrough pain. It was difficult to wean off but now use Oxy IR and get very good pain relief and my usage is "by the book"
